title: See the Results!
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Shizuku-chan! Your performance was spectacular~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Really? Ehehe, I’m happy to hear that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>In the final scene, I cried so much that Elichi got worried about me......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I’m honored that I captured your attention! ...Wait, huh? Where’s Eli-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>In the end, Elichi cried a lot too. She went to go buy water and calm herself down. Don’t tell her that I told you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufufu, I see! Oh right, for today’s play, I really immersed myself in my role. It was all thanks to your fortune-telling from a while ago. You said, “The performance is the day you will show the thing you love that you’ve worked hard for every day to everyone.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’m glad you remembered.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I will never forget those words as long as I continue to act!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Then, you’re going to keep making us cry with your performances? I see~ ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, I’m going to move everyone to tears!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
